\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
\subsubsection*{template$<$size\+\_\+t L$>$\newline
class Particle\+Filter$<$ L $>$}
Initializes a particle filter with a pre-\/specified number of particles. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
Due to current efficiency limitations, the particle limit is 500 (Takes approximately 6ms to compute each frame). For calculating frame time, estimate processing time to be 12Âµs/particle.
\end{DoxyWarning}

\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em L} & Number of particle to initialize the filter with. More is generally better for accuracy, however there are diminishing returns once the particle count is greater than 100, view warning for notes on large particle quantities. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
